remarks: Define the function giving: the class of all elements of ` A ` that are "smaller" than ` X ` according to ` R ` .  (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
df-bnj14 $p |- _pred ( X , A , R ) = { y e. A | y R X } $.
$d A y $.
$d R y $.
$d X y $.
